messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] apologies
messages.msgSnippet: Well - that was weird. I sent that post and it took hours to go through. Turns out that the email, itself, contains the worm and you only have to open the
messages.messageBody:
Well - that was weird. I sent that post and it took hours to go through.

Turns out that the email, itself, contains the "worm" and you only
have to open the email to infect your own computer.

Doesn't appear, so far, to do anything too bad - other than send more
email.

-pam

On Jun 12, 2006, at 10:57 AM, Pamela Sorooshian wrote:

> That is why most list owners set their lists to not allow attachments.
>
> Nothing went through to this list - so nobody could have opened it,
> here.

Unschooling shirts, cups, bumper stickers, bags...
Live Love Learn
UNSCHOOL!

messages.subject: apologies
messages.msgSnippet: My apologies, I was opening group mail and some how yahoo over looked that it was a worm/virus and sent out email that was not from me. I hope no one else
messages.messageBody:
My apologies, I was opening group mail and some how yahoo over looked
that it was a worm/virus and sent out email that was not from me. I
hope no one else opened it. I am so sorry.

Danie
